about_the_game:
This is the tetromino game you've always wanted. Implement advanced techniques not found in any other tetromino game. Use zig-zag, zipper, x-ray techniques, and multiplayer tactics to clear 5-10 lines at a time. Play solo or go nuclear with up to four players.

  • Easy to learn. Hard to master.

  • X-ray, zipper, zig-zag features not found in any other tetromino game.

  • Combines classic tetromino gameplay with chaining techniques.

  • Play with up to four friends.

Team up with with friends to build faster and make larger chains.

Make huge chains with advanced techniques
